text:
Is there anything open source similar to below where I can just point to a registry and get a list of dependents for a package?

> <https://juliahub.com/ui/Packages/Flux/QdkVy/0.11.6?t=2>

elements.text: Is there anything open source similar to below where I can just point to a registry and get a list of dependents for a package?

text: Direct dependants it's easy, read all Deps.toml files and find which ones depend on your package. For the indirect ones you need to do a recursive search

elements.text: Direct dependants it's easy, read all Deps.toml files and find which ones depend on your package. For the indirect ones you need to do a recursive search

text: Yeah just got that list, was being really lazy though :joy:

elements.text: Yeah just got that list, was being really lazy though
